entries.name: shellescape(str)
entries.desc: Escapes a string so that it can be safely used in a Bourne shell command line.  str can be a non-string object that responds to to_s.

entries.name: shelljoin(array)
entries.desc: Builds a command line string from an argument list, array.

entries.name: shellsplit(line)
entries.desc: Splits a string into an array of tokens in the same way the UNIX Bourne shell does.
